meanings.definition: A lightweight box for holding hats or other small articles.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed her new hat in one of the bandboxes.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop displayed various bandboxes on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the bandboxes were perfect for hiding.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like fragile bandboxes, easily crushed by reality.
meanings.sent5: The bandboxes lined up on the dresser looked like colorful little houses.

meanings.sent1: The excuses he made were just bandboxes, easily seen through.
meanings.sent2: The plan was full of bandboxes, destined to fail.
meanings.sent3: The argument fell apart like a stack of bandboxes in a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her promises were as empty as bandboxes, with nothing inside.
meanings.sent5: His confidence was like a row of bandboxes, ready to collapse at any moment.
